mediaDisplay.text:
* Press "Menu" on the remote to display the on-screen main menu.
The main menu runs horizontally across the top of the screen and lists each media player feature. It can be accessed from every media player screen.
The feature menus are accessed via the main menu. Each feature menu contains options specific to the screen currently displayed when you open the menu.
All menus are controlled by the remote control buttons: * Press "Menu" on the remote to display the on-screen main menu. * Use the arrow keys on the remote to navigate the main menu. * Press "OK" on the remote to carry out a selected action. * When a menu is open, press "Menu" on the remote to close the menu without performing an action. * When a new screen is displayed, press "Menu" on the remote to display the menu options available for that screen.
11111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111
